element.name: ProductId
element.description: A Product's unique identifier.

element.name: ProductName
element.description: A Product's name.

element.name: ProductReceivedTime
element.description: The ISO 8601 formatted time that the Product was received.

element.name: Filename
element.description: The names of the files that represent this product.

element.name: FileLocation
element.description: The locations of the files that represent this product.

element.name: ProductType
element.description: Type of product, as specified by, e.g., a data bible.

element.name: ProductStructure
element.description: Whether or not a product is Flat (e.g., a set of independent files), or hierarchical, e.g., a dir structure.

element.name: MimeType
element.description: The IETF mime type of this product.

element.name: DataVersion
element.description: The version of the data product

element.name: Antennas
element.description: Antennas recorded from during the experiment

element.name: CenterFrequency
element.description: Spectral window centre frequency in Hz

element.name: ChannelWidth
element.description: Channel width in Hz of each frequency channel

element.name: Description
element.description: The observer description for the experiment

element.name: DumpPeriod
element.description: Correlator output dump rate

element.name: Duration
element.description: The experiment duration

element.name: ExperimentId
element.description: The UUID for the experiment

element.name: FileDigest
element.description: MD5 check sum for the file

element.name: FileSize
element.description: Filesize in bytes

element.name: InstructionSet
element.description: The script and parameters for the observation

element.name: InputDataProductId
element.description: The input product to process

element.name: KatfileVersion
element.description: KAT HDF5 major/minor version

element.name: NumFreqChannels
element.description: Number of frequency channels in the correlator output

element.name: Observer
element.description: The experiment observer

element.name: ReductionName
element.description: The reduction function to call

element.name: RefAntenna
element.description: The reference antenna for the experiment

element.name: StartTime
element.description: The experiment start time in UTC

element.name: Targets
element.description: A list of katpoint targets captured during the experiment

element.name: KatpointTargets
element.description: A list of katpoint targets captured during the experiment
